snippet: Drs. Richard C. Wender of the American Cancer Society and Liane Philpotts of the Yale School of Medicine discuss the recent study that saw little value in the screening test.
lead_paragraph: Drs. Richard C. Wender of the American Cancer Society and Liane Philpotts of the Yale School of Medicine discuss the recent study that saw little value in the screening test.

headline.main: Women and Mammograms: Doctors Weigh In
headline.print_headline: Women and Mammograms: Doctors Weigh In
